items.sentence: I think that it's time for me to wash my car.

Boston is about a three-hour drive from here.
Tom hopes to compete one day in the Olympics.

I suspect that Tom doesn't like me very much.
I suspected that Tom was allergic to peanuts.

Tom was wearing a T-shirt and a baseball cap.
Tom was wrong to blame Mary for the accident.
